Mutual Information-Based Speaker-content
Disentanglement in Lip-to-Speech Synthesis

Anonymous Author(s)

Under review at NeurIPS 2024

Demos are randomly selected from the test set without cherry-picking. For demo purpose, we additionally adopt Vocos for better audio quality. We use the pretrained checkpoints from the original Vocos repository without any further finetuning on GRID dataset. Select vocoder: .
